name: Falls Balls and Walls (Xsce_sk)
description:
In Falls Balls and Walls, players must work against each other to come out on top in a fast paced 2D platformer. One player controls a ball that is able to change sizes. The ball also has the ability to slowly move their farther to the right by decreasing and increasing in size. The other player has the ability to spawn obstacles that the ball must overcome with it's size changing ability.  If the ball is able to move off of the right side of the screen, the player controlling the ball wins the game.  If the other player can force the ball to go off of the left side of the screen with obstacles, the player that controls the map wins the game.

This game was created in 48 hours for the VGDC Fall 2017 Proto Game Jam. The theme of the game jam was "Don't Stop Me Now"

Controls:

  • Player 1
    • [A] Decrease Size
    • [D] Increase Size
    • [Shift] Resize Quicker
  • Player 2
    • [Left Arrow] Spawn Cave
    • [Down Arrow] Spawn Hole
    • [Right Arrow] Spawn Bump

Contributions:

This was my first time working with Unity. I originally wanted to help program the game but I had to leave on Saturday to volunteer. I helped develop the game where I could and switched to art/sound near the end to help the team even though I was not able to make it to the jam site on Saturday night and Sunday morning.

  • Conceived the idea for the game
  • Helped with the design
  • Created the art assets
    • Logo
    • Home screen controls
    • Chose the color palette
  • Programmed the camera movement
